items.question: Do I need a credit card to start?
items.answer: No! Start tracking your applications immediately, no credit card required. Upgrade to Pro when you need unlimited tracking.

items.question: What AI features are included?
items.answer: AI Coach plan includes resume analysis, cover letter generation, interview preparation, job fit analysis, and personalized career advice chat.

items.question: What happens when I get hired?
items.answer: When you mark that you've accepted a job offer, we'll prompt you to cancel your subscription. We don't want you paying for something you no longer need.

items.question: How does the AI Coach help?
items.answer: Our AI analyzes your resume, generates tailored cover letters, prepares you for interviews, and provides personalized career advice - all based on specific job descriptions.
